Articles.Content:
Year 4, Voyager Nation launched the Explorer probe to the mysterious Joolian system. The mission took almost 2 years to reach the system and ended with the probe getting an escape trajectory out of the solar system. Its extended mission beginning after the flyby.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Thousands of years later the probe, still recognizable, passes by a star with a cube world that defied the laws of the universe. Then later the probe passed a planet with a violent race that was beginning its venture into the unknown. Flying uninterrupted through interstellar space, the probe will continue to travel forever.

(inspired by Nassault)

Edited August 26, 2015 by Voyager275
It's always fun to get stuff completely out of the solar system. Do you think some distant race will pimp it out and send it back where it came from, destroying all in its path?

It's always fun to get stuff completely out of the solar system. Do you think some distant race will pimp it out and send it back where it came from, destroying all in its path?

Probably not, considering the probe will have been damaged by impacts from cosmic dust and other things.
